channel.title: The First Project
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]There's a first for everything, and this is only the start.[/size][/center]
[center][img]http://i1093.photobucket.com/albums/i427/Cowswithwings/Banner.png[/img][/center]
I would show a lot of pictures, but I would like to start completely from new and make this an original server without being a leeching noob.
[b]A little bit about me to start with, this will affect your decision to apply or not:[/b] I'm 16, A few years back, I had my own server, It wasn't a great success and I [u]obviously[/u] was just a leecher with changing a few things. I'm back now and I really want to make a success of a server, No leeching, nothing like that, just originality and making it a great success. I've only been learning programming a few days now, so I only know the basics, if that, but I'm more than willing to put the time and effort into learning and doing everything I can to make this a great success. I realized that if I did all of this on myself, It would take forever and it would just be a daunting project, because i'd have to be learning everything as well do the programming all by myself - This is why I thought..I'm sure their is other people out there like me, or even just generally kind people that are willing to help me. Enough about me anyway.
[center][size=14pt]I would like this server to have[/size][/center]
[ul][li]All of the updated items. (614 - I think.)[/li] [li]Be a 602 BUT with the old school characters and graphics like a (317) Their's no beating them.[/li] [li]I would like a GE(Grand Exchange)[/li] [li]A web-client and also a downloadable client.[/li] [li]Many more but for the moment my mind has gone blank....[/li][/ul]
I think out of everything I would like to do, 4 or 5 Coders would be a decent amount for this type of project.
[center]Coders:[/center]
[center]Exzilled - Coder 1[/center] [center]Coder 2[/center] [center]Coder 3[/center] [center]Coder 4[/center] [center]Coder 5[/center]
And Ofcourse, where would we be without Suggestors? 2-3 Of them would be a decent amount. If they could all talk together and come up with some great idea's.
[center]Suggestors:[/center]
[center]Suggestor 1[/center] [center]Suggestor 2[/center]
We would all need testers. They save us a lot of time and are a great help. - Will be provided with some type of reward when server is finished and running.
[center]Testers:[/center]
[center]Tester 1[/center] [center]Tester 2[/center] [center]Tester 3[/center] [center]Tester 4[/center]
Donator's are always a great help, but I would understand if no one did donate as this will be my first project and I'm learning.
[center]Donators:[/center]
[center]Donator 1[/center] [center]Donator 2[/center] [center]Donator 3[/center]
To apply for any of these roles here is the [size=12pt][b]Application Form:[/b][/size]
[center]To apply for a coder just copy and paste this application and fill it out:[/center]
[center][code]In-Game Name? How old are you? Skype OR Msn? What makes you want to apply for being a coder? How long have you coded? What time zone are you in? How long will you be on everyday? Why do you want to become part of this server? Any Suggestions?: If you'd like to tell me anything about yourself - Here's the space to do so:[/code][/center]
[center]If you would like to be a suggestor: [/center]
[center][code]In-Game Name? How old are you? Skype OR Msn? What makes you want to apply for being a suggestor? What time zone are you in? Will you actively think of ways to make the server better daily? Why do you want to become part of this server? Any Suggestions?: If you'd like to tell me anything about yourself - Here's the space to do so:[/code][/center]
[center]If you would like to be a tester whilst we are programming, fill out this application:[/center]
[center][code]In-Game Name? How old are you? Skype OR Msn? What makes you want to apply for being a tester? Will you actively spot out any mistakes (bugs) we make? What time zone are you in? How long will you be on everyday? Why do you want to become part of this server? Any Suggestions?: If you'd like to tell me anything about yourself - Here's the space to do so:[/code][/center]
[center]If you would like to be a Donator, fill out this application:[/center]
[center][code]In-Game Name? How old are you? Skype OR Msn? What makes you want to donate for us? What time zone are you in? How long will you be on everyday? Why do you want to become part of this server? Any Suggestions?: If you'd like to tell me anything about yourself - Here's the space to do so:[/code][/center]
[center]Please, no hates, I don't have time for you, I would just like this server to be a great success.[/center]

item.title: The First Project
item.dc:creator: @jummppy jummppy
item.description:
@jummppy wrote:

In-Game Name? wanted
How old are you? 15
Skype OR Msn? skype(Owner_Ghost)
What makes you want to apply for being a coder?i wanna learn my java better.
How long have you coded?like 3days
What time zone are you in?central US
How long will you be on everyday?6-8hrs
Why do you want to become part of this server?to help out grow a healthy community and be part of a project
Any Suggestions?:
If you’d like to tell me anything about yourself - Here’s the space to do so:

Read full topic

item.title: The First Project
item.dc:creator: @gears2011 gears2011
item.description:
@gears2011 wrote:

In-Game Name? dream real name : josh
How old are you? 17
Skype OR Msn? josh.magee5 and yoshi1975@live.com.au
What makes you want to apply for being a coder? to help out, have fun and join a server
How long have you coded? 4 years
What time zone are you in? +10 gmt
How long will you be on everyday? 4-6 hrs
Why do you want to become part of this server? be apart of a new server, help out and have fun.
Any Suggestions?:
If you’d like to tell me anything about yourself - Here’s the space to do so:
i have had alot of staffing experiences on 10+ server’s.

Read full topic

item.title: The First Project
item.dc:creator: @Exzilled Exzilled
item.description:
@Exzilled wrote:

[center][size=18pt]There’s a first for everything, and this is only the start.[/size][/center]

[center][/center]

I would show a lot of pictures, but I would like to start completely from new and make this an original server without being a leeching noob.

A little bit about me to start with, this will affect your decision to apply or not: I’m 16, A few years back, I had my own server, It wasn’t a great success and I obviously was just a leecher with changing a few things.
I’m back now and I really want to make a success of a server, No leeching, nothing like that, just originality and making it a great success. I’ve only been learning programming a few days now, so I only know the basics, if that, but I’m more than willing to put the time and effort into learning and doing everything I can to make this a great success.
I realized that if I did all of this on myself, It would take forever and it would just be a daunting project, because i’d have to be learning everything as well do the programming all by myself - This is why I thought…I’m sure their is other people out there like me, or even just generally kind people that are willing to help me. Enough about me anyway.

[center][size=14pt]I would like this server to have[/size][/center]

[ul][li]All of the updated items. (614 - I think.)[/li]
[li]Be a 602 BUT with the old school characters and graphics like a (317) Their’s no beating them.[/li]
[li]I would like a GE(Grand Exchange)[/li]
[li]A web-client and also a downloadable client.[/li]
[li]Many more but for the moment my mind has gone blank…[/li][/ul]

I think out of everything I would like to do, 4 or 5 Coders would be a decent amount for this type of project.

[center]Coders:[/center]

[center]Exzilled - Coder 1[/center]
[center]Coder 2[/center]
[center]Coder 3[/center]
[center]Coder 4[/center]
[center]Coder 5[/center]

And Ofcourse, where would we be without Suggestors? 2-3 Of them would be a decent amount.
If they could all talk together and come up with some great idea’s.

[center]Suggestor 2[/center]

We would all need testers. They save us a lot of time and are a great help. - Will be provided with some type of reward when server is finished and running.

[center]Tester 4[/center]

Donator’s are always a great help, but I would understand if no one did donate as this will be my first project and I’m learning.

[center]Donator 2[/center]
[center]Donator 3[/center]

To apply for any of these roles here is the [size=12pt]Application Form:[/size]

[center]To apply for a coder just copy and paste this application and fill it out:[/center]

[center]In-Game Name? How old are you? Skype OR Msn? What makes you want to apply for being a coder? How long have you coded? What time zone are you in? How long will you be on everyday? Why do you want to become part of this server? Any Suggestions?: If you'd like to tell me anything about yourself - Here's the space to do so:[/center]

[center]In-Game Name? How old are you? Skype OR Msn? What makes you want to apply for being a suggestor? What time zone are you in? Will you actively think of ways to make the server better daily? Why do you want to become part of this server? Any Suggestions?: If you'd like to tell me anything about yourself - Here's the space to do so:[/center]

[center]In-Game Name? How old are you? Skype OR Msn? What makes you want to apply for being a tester? Will you actively spot out any mistakes (bugs) we make? What time zone are you in? How long will you be on everyday? Why do you want to become part of this server? Any Suggestions?: If you'd like to tell me anything about yourself - Here's the space to do so:[/center]
